name: DodgeFall
description: Use fullscreen for the best gaming experience. Left and Right Arrow Keys is to move left and right. Space is to jump and throw ball at enemy. Up is for an even higher jump. IF YOUR CHARACTER IS NOT MOVING, CLICK ON THE GAME SCREEN! Huge enemies on the right and left are guards that won't move, but can tip over leading to a smaller room to move around. If an enemy touches you, the game restarts. If your ball hits the enemy, the enemy disappears and you can 1 point added to your score. Tip - Always move and anticipate the spawn point. Also, jumping could help but you could get spawn killed by enemies.
